description: Update an action item line item.
permissions: User must be authorized to update action items via the delegated ActionItemLineItemPolicy (delegated to action_item); action item update permission allows admins or users with appropriate org membership per ActionItemPolicy.
side_effects: Updates an action item line item and triggers an asynchronous action item summary update.
validation_notes: At least one attribute or relationship must be provided to update. status must be open or closed when provided. due-on expects YYYY-MM-DD. responsible-person must be a team member on the parent action item when provided; setting responsible-person to an empty value clears it. action-item relationship is create-only and cannot be changed on update.
